Open Source Built by journalists, for journalists

Built for Investigative Journalism

AI that protects your sources

Sourcery.info is designed specifically for journalists who need to analyze sensitive documents while maintaining absolute privacy. No cloud services, no data sharing, no compromises.

Complete Privacy

Everything runs locally on your machine or network. No data ever leaves your control, making it perfect for air-gapped environments and sensitive investigations.

Smart Document Analysis

Automatically identify people, organizations, and relationships in your documents. Build dossiers and track connections across your entire document collection.

Journalist-First Design

Built with input from investigative journalists worldwide. Handles messy documents, supports multiple formats, and focuses on the real needs of newsrooms.
